title: Systems Design Practical Competency Enhancement: Knowledge Ecosystem Building Workshop for Early-Career Academics

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design and utilize a personalized knowledge-sharing platform within one week.
Learners secure at least three learning resources by establishing relationships with peer teachers and experts.
Learners implement and present results of at least two informal learning strategies in digital and offline environments.
Learners establish self-directed research plans by applying a knowledge ecosystem model.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
